_id.description: Unique MongoDB identifier for the assignment document.

assignmentId.description: Custom numeric identifier for the assignment.

lessonId.description: Identifier linking this assignment to its related lesson.

courseId.description: Identifier linking this assignment to its parent course.

title.description: Title or name of the assignment.

description.description: Detailed explanation or instructions for the assignment.

dueDate.description: The date and time when the assignment is due.

isActive.description: Indicates whether the assignment is currently active or not.

createdAt.description: Timestamp when the assignment was created.

updatedAt.description: Timestamp when the assignment was last updated.

description: Schema definition for the Assignments collection, representing tasks linked to lessons within a course.
